meta.title: Services | Kris French Web Development
meta.description: Web development services including custom site builds, hosting, and ongoing maintenance for local businesses in the Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura area.

intro.heading: Services
intro.description: I offer a range of web development services tailored to small businesses and individuals.

servicesList.title: Landing Page Development
servicesList.description: Fast, responsive, and SEO-friendly landing pages built with modern tools.

servicesList.title: Website Maintenance
servicesList.description: Keep your site secure and up-to-date with regular monitoring and updates.

servicesList.title: Bug Fixes & Small Tasks
servicesList.description: Quick turnaround for fixing broken layouts, errors, or small feature requests.

servicesList.title: Hosting & Deployment
servicesList.description: Setup and manage hosting for your site, ensuring reliability and uptime.

cta.heading: Ready to Start?
cta.body: Let's work together to create a website that helps your business grow.

techStack.heading: Skills & Tools
